# GreyMisnomer

**Operating in the spaces between**

> Operating in the grey areas between policy and technology.

GreyMisnomer is an open-source initiative focused on designing
verifiable, scalable, and policy-aligned digital infrastructure for
**international voluntary carbon markets**.

## Focus Areas
- Carbon credit lifecycle & serialization
- Digital MRV (Measurement, Reporting, Verification)
- Registry interoperability
- Cryptographic trust (ZKPs, auditability)
- Research ‚Üí Architecture ‚Üí PoC ‚Üí Production pipelines

## Live
üåê [Live site](https://prabhatkarlekar.github.io/GreyMisnomer/)

## Project Status
Architecture & governance definition 


Documentation and code will be added progressively as the voluntary carbon market specifications are finalized to ‚Üí `/docs`, `/architecture` and `/governance` folders.
